name: aave-protocol-subgraph
description: This package contains subgraph of the Aave protocol

scripts.codegen-raw: TYPE=raw npm run prepare && graph codegen --output-dir ./raw/generated
scripts.deploy-local-raw: TYPE=raw npm run prepare && graph deploy aave/protocol --ipfs http://graph-ipfs:5001 --node http://graph-node:8020
scripts.deploy-remote: npm run prepare && graph deploy aave/${NAME:-null} --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-multy-ropsten-raw: NETWORK=ropsten TYPE=raw NAME=protocol-multy-ropsten-raw npm run deploy-remote
scripts.deploy-multy-kovan-raw: NETWORK=kovan TYPE=raw NAME=protocol-multy-kovan-raw npm run deploy-remote
scripts.deploy-multy-main-raw: NETWORK=mainnet TYPE=raw NAME=protocol-multy-raw npm run deploy-remote

author: AAVE <tech@aave.com>
